package di

import (
	"context"
	internal "example.com/test/di/internal"
	"sync"
	"time"
)

type Container struct {
	mu *sync.Mutex
	c  *internal.Container
}

type Injector func(c *Container) error

func NewContainer(injectors ...Injector) (*Container, error) {
	c := &Container{
		c:  internal.NewContainer(),
		mu: &sync.Mutex{},
	}

	for _, inject := range injectors {
		err := inject(c)
		if err != nil {
			return nil, err
		}
	}

	return c, nil
}

func (c *Container) StringOption(ctx context.Context) (string, error) {
	c.mu.Lock()
	defer c.mu.Unlock()

	s := c.c.StringOption(ctx)
	err := c.c.Error()

	return s, err
}

func (c *Container) StringPointer(ctx context.Context) (*string, error) {
	c.mu.Lock()
	defer c.mu.Unlock()

	s := c.c.StringPointer(ctx)
	err := c.c.Error()

	return s, err
}

func (c *Container) IntOption(ctx context.Context) (int, error) {
	c.mu.Lock()
	defer c.mu.Unlock()

	s := c.c.IntOption(ctx)
	err := c.c.Error()

	return s, err
}

func (c *Container) TimeOption(ctx context.Context) (time.Time, error) {
	c.mu.Lock()
	defer c.mu.Unlock()

	s := c.c.TimeOption(ctx)
	err := c.c.Error()

	return s, err
}

func (c *Container) DurationOption(ctx context.Context) (time.Duration, error) {
	c.mu.Lock()
	defer c.mu.Unlock()

	s := c.c.DurationOption(ctx)
	err := c.c.Error()

	return s, err
}

func (c *Container) Close() {
	c.mu.Lock()
	defer c.mu.Unlock()

	c.c.Close()
}
